Shoppers receive confirmation at drop-off

How it works

01

Shoppers enjoy easy, box-free, label-free drop off

After starting their return online, shoppers bring their items to a Return Bar® location of their choice, without needing to package or print anything.

02

Returned items are scanned and verified to help reduce fraud

Every item in the return is scanned and verified using our patent-pending process, ensuring the correct items and number of items are present. Returned items are sealed into a labeled bag, which is tracked as it travels back to the retailer.

03

Refunds and exchanges are initiated instantly

As soon as the return is approved, the shopper's refund or exchange is initiated, and they receive an email confirmation. This reduces 'Where is my refund?' calls.  

04

Returns are consolidated and shipped together, reducing costs

Returns from all retailers are consolidated and shipped together to the closest regional Return Hub.

05

Bulk shipments leave our warehouse with advanced notice

When returns arrive to our regional Hubs, they are sorted by retailer, boxed, palletized, and shipped in bulk with advanced shipping notice to the retailer.

Compared to receiving thousands of individual return packages, our consolidated, bulk shipments helping improve efficiency of restock upon arrival, saving time and money.

See it in action

The combination of technology and reverse logistics delivers a reliable, comprehensive solution for returns and exchanges. 

Choose how to connect to our Return Bar® network 

We're return portal agnostic. That means you can integrate with the Return Bar® network using your existing portal or ours.

There are three easy ways to connect. 

OPTION 1

Use the Happy Returns Portal

A free option for enterprise retailers, included with our Return Bar® network.

Learn more →

OPTION 2

Integrate with a portal partner

Interested in or already using another returns portal? We have partnerships with AfterShip, Loop, parcelLab, and more. Fast and fully supported.

See partners →

OPTION 3

Use your own

Prefer full control? Connect via our headless API and keep your homegrown software.
